main event: Three small bright silver orbs were observed in Silver Springs, Maryland on 3 August 1959.
interesting points: The objects appeared to have a spinning motion while flying in a northward direction., The sighting lasted approximately 15 minutes., The objects seemed to vary in size and were reported to be much larger than conventional aircraft., They made no noise during the observation., The sighting was recorded as an unusual phenomenon ruled out as conventional aircraft or astronomical objects.
witness description: The witnesses included a neighbor and the person who called their attention to the sighting.
